title: God’s Warning and Solomon’s Achievements
summary: God appears to Solomon a second time, confirming His covenant but warning that disobedience will bring destruction. The chapter lists Solomon’s achievements in building cities, organizing labor, and securing alliances.

faq.question: What was God’s message to Solomon in His second appearance?
faq.answer: To remain faithful or else the temple would be destroyed and Israel exiled.

faq.question: What were some of Solomon’s accomplishments?
faq.answer: Building projects, fortified cities, forced labor, and trade agreements.
